description:
In a surprise victory, you have been elected President. Now, it is up to you to push your morals and values upon hundreds of millions of people. What will be the fate of the United States of America?

Create laws, grant and revoke freedoms, commit crimes, and yell at your enemies on Twitter. Oh yeah, and play lots of golf, because what else could a President have to do?

How long can you stay in power?

Doing math has never been so addictive!

Prove your skill by topping the charts in Speed Math. Add, subtract, multiply and divide your way to the top of the leaderboards, all while improving your mental math skills.

You'll thank me when you realize you can now calculate tax at the grocery store without pulling out your phone ;)
